text: læa xallxhˌ thrng hı bangkeid sing mi chiwit thuk chnid cak na dangnan nı hmu phwk man man ca kheluxn yay dwy thxng khxng man læa nı hmu phwk man man ca dein dwy thea thang sxng læa nı hmu phwk man man ca dein dwy thea thang si xallxhˌ thrng bangkeid sing thi phraxngkh thrng prasngkh thæcring xallxhˌ nan thrng xanuphaph henux thuk sing
